item.title: Coding Interview: Warm Up
item.author: Debakar Roy
item.description: FizzBuzz Link to original Problem on LeetCode Write a program that outputs the string representation of numbers from 1 to n. But for multiples of three, it should output “Fizz” instead of the number and for the multiples of five output “Buzz”. For numbers which are multiples of both three and five output “FizzBuzz”. Example: n = 15, Return: [ “1”, “2”, “Fizz”, “4”, “Buzz”, “Fizz”, “7”, “8”, “Fizz”, “Buzz”, “11”, “Fizz”, “13”, “14”, “FizzBuzz” ]
